column5: Anyone ever take part in the rod/reel trade in? Seems like a good cause with the trade ins being donated to kids. How exactly does it work?
In the past, the more you spend on a new item the better the $/% off your purchase was as long as the item being turned in was in good working order.

In the past, the more you spend on a new item the better the $/% off your purchase was as long as the item being turned in was in good working order.  Yep. The website will have this year's ratio of percent off and the dates. I think in the past here at the Vaughan store the rod and reel deals are different weeks.
It's the entire two week period for both I believe
